description:
gTech’s Product and Tools Operations team (gPTO) leverages deep user, operational, and technical insights to innovate Google's Ads products into customer experiences that are so intuitive (or automated) that they require no support at all. gPTO partners closely with gTech’s Support, Professional Services, Product Management, and Engineering teams to innovate and simplify our Ads products and build the productivity tools ecosystem for gTech users.

As a Customer Insights Lead in the CX Lab, you will oversee data-backed voice of customer insights about Google’s advertising product experiences. You will analyze qualitative customer data, and create rigorous customer voice insight presentations for executive stakeholders in product and engineering.

The Customer Experience Lab conducts customer experience research on advertisers who are using Google’s Marketing Solutions. The team is charged with generating insights for Product and Engineering to improve the product experience for advertisers. You are passionate about taking on data-backed, customer voice insights to enable the next generation of advertiser experiences.

Google creates products and services that make the world a better place, and gTech’s role is to help bring them to life. Our teams of solution-oriented trusted advisors support millions of customers globally. Our solutions are rooted in our technical skill, product expertise, and a thorough understanding of our customers’ complex needs. Whether the answer is a bespoke solution to solve a unique problem, or a new tool that can scale across Google, everything we do aims to ensure our customers benefit from the full potential of Google products.

To learn more about gTech, check out our video.
eeo: At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in an analytical field (e.g. Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, Economics, etc) or equivalent practical experience.
  • 5 years of work experience with quantitative methods and analysis (e.g., management consulting).
  • 1 year of work experience in marketing or with online advertising solutions.

Preferred qualifications:

  • MBA degree.
  • Experience with creating effective presentations for various audiences independently, and is a master of developing substantive, impactful, and compelling communications.
  • Passion for championing data-backed customer voice insights to product teams to enable the next generation of advertiser experiences.
  • Demonstrated understanding of quantitative reasoning and basic statistics.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
responsibilities:
• Design and analyze scaled voice of customer research to deepen understanding of the customer experience of advertisers.
  • Extract actionable insights and develop compelling data-driven customer voice presentations.
  • Prioritize and communicate customer needs to product and engineering.
  • Collaborate with cross functional stakeholders during research design, development, and insights sharing phases.
title: Customer Insights Lead, CX Lab
